briefdescription.para: Enum for Entities involved in a style.

detaileddescription.para:
The enumerator is used for identifying the entity being operated on when generic database functions are being run.
rename(), remove(), symbolsOfFavorite(), symbolsWithTag(), symbolsOfSmartgroup()

briefdescription.para: Constructor for QgsStyle.
Adds a color ramp to the style.

detaileddescription.para:
Calling this method takes the ramp's ownership.
Adding a color ramp with the name of existing one replaces it.
name
is the name of the color ramp being added or updated
colorRamp
is the color ramp. Ownership is transferred.
update
set to true when the style DB has to be updated, by default it is false
success status of the operation

briefdescription.para: Adds the specified symbol to favorites.

parameterdescription.para: is either SymbolEntity of ColorrampEntity
is the name of the symbol or coloramp whose is to be added to favorites

simplesect.para: returns the success state as bool

briefdescription.para: Adds a new smartgroup to the database and returns the id.

parameterdescription.para: is the name of the new Smart Group to be added
is the operator between the conditions; AND/OR as QString
are the smart group conditions

memberdef.argsstring: (const QString &name, const QString &op, const QStringList &matchTag, const QStringList &noMatchTag, const QStringList &matchName, const QStringList &noMatchName)
memberdef.name: addSmartgroup

briefdescription.para: Adds a new smartgroup to the database and returns the id.

parameterdescription.para: is the name of the new Smart Group to be added
is the operator between the conditions; AND/OR as QString
list of strings to match within tags
list of strings to exclude matches from tags
list of string to match within names
list of strings to exclude matches from names

briefdescription.para: Adds a symbol to style and takes symbol's ownership.

simplesect.para: Adding a symbol with the name of existing one replaces it.

parameterdescription.para: is the name of the symbol being added or updated
is the Vector symbol
set to true when the style DB has to be updated, by default it is false

briefdescription.para: Adds a new tag and returns the tag's id.

parameterdescription.para: the name of the new tag to be created

simplesect.para: returns an int, which is the DB id of the new tag created, 0 if the tag couldn't be created

briefdescription.para: Removes all contents of the style.
Returns a new copy of the specified color ramp.

detaileddescription.para: The caller takes responsibility for deleting the returned object.

briefdescription.para: Returns count of color ramps.
Returns the id in the style database for the given colorramp name returns 0 if not found.
Returns a list of names of color ramps.
Returns a const pointer to a symbol (doesn't create new instance)
Creates an on-disk database.

detaileddescription.para:
This function creates a new on-disk permanent style database.
returns the success state of the database creation
createMemoryDatabase()
QGIS 3.0

briefdescription.para: Creates a temporary memory database.

detaileddescription.para:
This function is used to create a temporary style database in case a permanent on-disk database is not needed.
returns the success state of the temporary memory database creation
createDatabase()
QGIS 3.0

briefdescription.para: Creates tables structure for new database.

detaileddescription.para:
This function is used to create the tables structure in a newly-created database.
returns the success state of the temporary memory database creation
createDatabase()
createMemoryDatabase()
QGIS 3.0

briefdescription.para: Detags the symbol with the given list.

detaileddescription.para:
Removes the given tags for the specified symbol or colorramp
type
is either SymbolEntity or ColorrampEntity
symbol
is the name of the symbol or colorramp
tags
is the list of tags that are to be removed as QStringList
returns the success state of the operation

briefdescription.para: Clears the symbol from all attached tags.

detaileddescription.para:
Removes all tags for the specified symbol or colorramp
type
is either SymbolEntity or ColorrampEntity
symbol
is the name of the symbol or colorramp
returns the success state of the operation

briefdescription.para: Returns last error from load/save operation.
Exports the style as a XML file.
Returns current file name of the style.
Returns the names of the symbols which have a matching 'substring' in its definition.

parameterdescription.para: is either SymbolEntity or ColorrampEntity
is the query string to search the symbols or colorramps.

simplesect.para: A QStringList of the matched symbols or colorramps

briefdescription.para: Imports the symbols and colorramps into the default style database from the given XML file.
Loads a file into the style.

detaileddescription.para:
This function will load an on-disk database and populate styles.
filename
location of the database to load styles from
returns the success state of the database being loaded

briefdescription.para: Removes the specified entity from the db.

parameterdescription.para: is any of the style entities. Refer enum StyleEntity.
is the DB id of the entity to be removed

briefdescription.para: Removes color ramp from style (and delete it)
Removes the specified symbol from favorites.

parameterdescription.para: is either SymbolEntity of ColorrampEntity
is the name of the symbol or coloramp whose is to be removed from favorites

simplesect.para: returns the success state as bool

briefdescription.para: Removes symbol from style (and delete it)
Renames the given entity with the specified id.

parameterdescription.para: is any of the style entities. Refer enum StyleEntity.
is the DB id of the entity which is to be renamed
is the new name of the entity

briefdescription.para: Changes ramp's name.
Renames a symbol from oldName to newName.

detaileddescription.para: Returns true if symbol was successfully renamed.

briefdescription.para: Saves style into a file (will use current filename if empty string is passed)

memberdef.argsstring: (const QString &name, QgsColorRamp *ramp, bool favorite, const QStringList &tags)
memberdef.name: saveColorRamp

briefdescription.para: Adds the colorramp to the DB.

parameterdescription.para: is the name of the colorramp as QString
is the pointer to the new QgsColorRamp being saved
is a boolean value to specify whether the colorramp should be added to favorites
is a list of tags that are associated with the color ramp as a QStringList.

simplesect.para: returns the success state of the save operation

memberdef.argsstring: (const QString &name, QgsSymbol *symbol, bool favorite, const QStringList &tags)
memberdef.name: saveSymbol

briefdescription.para: Adds the symbol to the DB with the tags.

parameterdescription.para: is the name of the symbol as QString
is the pointer to the new QgsSymbol being saved
is a boolean value to specify whether the symbol should be added to favorites
is a list of tags that are associated with the symbol as a QStringList.

simplesect.para: returns the success state of the save operation

briefdescription.para: Returns the QgsSmartConditionMap for the given id.
Returns the DB id for the given smartgroup name.
Returns the smart groups list.
Returns the operator for the smartgroup clumsy implementation TODO create a class for smartgroups.
Returns the smart groups map with id as key and name as value.
Returns a NEW copy of symbol.
Returns count of symbols in style.
Returns whether a given tag is associated with the symbol.

parameterdescription.para: is either SymbolEntity or ColorrampEntity
is the name of the symbol or color ramp
the name of the tag to look for

simplesect.para: A boolean value identicating whether a tag was found attached to the symbol

briefdescription.para: Returns the id in the style database for the given symbol name returns 0 if not found.
Returns a list of names of symbols.
Returns a const pointer to a symbol (doesn't create new instance)
Returns the symbol names which are flagged as favorite.

parameterdescription.para: is either SymbolEntity or ColorampEntity

simplesect.para: A QStringList of the symbol or colorramp names flagged as favorite

briefdescription.para: Returns the symbols for the smartgroup.
Returns the symbol names with which have the given tag.

parameterdescription.para: is either SymbolEntity or ColorampEntity
is id of the tag which has been applied over the symbol as int

simplesect.para: A QStringList of the symbol or colorramp names for the given tag id

briefdescription.para: Returns the tag name for the given id.
Returns the DB id for the given tag name.
Returns a list of all tags in the style database.
Returns the tags associated with the symbol.

parameterdescription.para: is either SymbolEntity or ColorrampEntity
is the name of the symbol or color ramp

simplesect.para: A QStringList of the tags that have been applied to that symbol/colorramp

briefdescription.para: Tags the symbol with the tags in the list.

detaileddescription.para:
Applies the given tags to the given symbol or colorramp
type
is either SymbolEntity or ColorrampEntity
symbol
is the name of the symbol or colorramp as QString
tags
is the list of the tags that are to be applied as QStringList
returns the success state of the operation

briefdescription.para: Deletes the default style. Only to be used by QgsApplication::exitQgis()
Returns default application-wide style.
Emitted whenever an entity's tags are changed.
Emitted whenever an entity is either favorited or un-favorited.
Is emitted every time a tag or smartgroup has been added, removed, or renamed.
Emitted whenever a color ramp has been added to the style and the database has been updated as a result.
Emitted whenever a color ramp's definition is changed.

detaileddescription.para: This does not include name or tag changes.

briefdescription.para: Emitted whenever a color ramp has been removed from the style and the database has been updated as a result.
Emitted whenever a color ramp has been renamed from oldName to newName.
Emitted whenever a symbol's definition is changed.

detaileddescription.para: This does not include name or tag changes.

briefdescription.para: Emitted whenever a symbol has been removed from the style and the database has been updated as a result.
Emitted whenever a symbol has been renamed from oldName to newName.
Emitted every time a new symbol has been added to the database.

detaileddescription.para:
Emitted whenever a symbol has been added to the style and the database has been updated as a result.
symbolRemoved()
rampAdded()
symbolChanged()

briefdescription.para: Gets the id from the table for the given name from the database, 0 if not found.
Gets the name from the table for the given id from the database, empty if not found.
Convenience function to open the DB and return a sqlite3 object.
Convenience function that would run queries which don't generate return values.

parameterdescription.para: query to run

briefdescription.para: Updates the properties of an existing symbol/colorramp.

simplesect.para: This should not be called separately, only called through addSymbol or addColorRamp

parameterdescription.para: is either SymbolEntity or ColorrampEntity
is the name of an existing symbol or a color ramp

simplesect.para: Success state of the update operation
